00010 package AlgParser;

00013 %close = ();

00015 sub new {
00016   my $package = shift;
00017   my (%ret);
00018   $ret{string} = "";
00019   $ret{posarray} = [];
00020   $ret{parseerror} = "";
00021   $ret{parseresult} = [];
00022   bless \%ret, $package;
00023   return \%ret;
00024 }
00025 
00026 sub inittokenizer {
00027   my($self, $string) = @_;
00028   $self->{string} =~ m/\G.*$/g;
00029   $self->{string} = undef;
00030   $self->{string} = $string;
00031   $self->{string} =~ m/\G.*$/g;
00032   $self->{string} =~ m/^/g;
00033 }
00034 
00035 $close{'{'} = '}';
00036 $close{'['} = ']';
00037 $close{'('} = ')';
00038 
00039 $binoper3 = '(?:\\^|\\*\\*)';
00040 $binoper2 = '[/*]';
00041 $binoper1 = '[-+]';
00042 $openparen = '[{(\\[]';
00043 $closeparen = '[})\\]]';
00044 $varname = '[A-Za-z](?:_[0-9]+)?';
00045 $specialvalue = '(?:e|pi)';
00046 $numberplain = '(?:\d+(?:\.\d*)?|\.\d+)';
00047 $numberE = '(?:' . $numberplain . 'E[-+]?\d+)';
00048 $number = '(?:' . $numberE . '|' . $numberplain . ')';
00049 #
00050 #  DPVC -- 2003/03/31
00051 #       added missing trig and inverse functions
00052 #
00053 #$trigfname = '(?:cosh|sinh|tanh|cot|(?:a(?:rc)?)?cos|(?:a(?:rc)?)?sin|' .
00054 #    '(?:a(?:rc)?)?tan|sech?)';
00055 $trigfname = '(?:(?:a(?:rc)?)?(?:sin|cos|tan|sec|csc|cot)h?)';
00056 #
00057 #  End DPVC
00058 #
00059 $otherfunc = '(?:exp|abs|logten|log|ln|sqrt|sgn|step|fact)';
00060 $funcname = '(?:' . $otherfunc . '|' . $trigfname . ')';
00061 
00062 $tokenregexp = "(?:($binoper3)|($binoper2)|($binoper1)|($openparen)|" .
00063     "($closeparen)|($funcname)|($specialvalue)|($varname)|" .
00064     "($numberE)|($number))";
00065 
00066 sub nexttoken {
00067   my($self) = shift;
00068   $self->{string} =~ m/\G\s+/gc;
00069   my($p1) = pos($self->{string}) || 0;
00070   if(scalar($self->{string} =~ m/\G$tokenregexp/gc)) {
00071         push @{$self->{posarray}}, [$p1, pos($self->{string})];
00072     if (defined($1)) {return ['binop3',  $1];}
00073     if (defined($2)) {return ['binop2',  $2];}
00074     if (defined($3)) {return ['binop1',  $3];}
00075     if (defined($4)) {return ['openp',   $4];}
00076     if (defined($5)) {return ['closep',  $5];}
00077     if (defined($6)) {return ['func1',   $6];}
00078     if (defined($7)) {return ['special', $7];}
00079     if (defined($8)) {return ['varname', $8];}
00080     if (defined($9)) {return ['numberE', $9];}
00081     if (defined($10)) {return ['number', $10];}
00082   }
00083   else {
00084     push @{$self->{posarray}}, [$p1, undef];
00085     return undef;
00086   }
00087 }
00088 
00089 sub parse {
00090   my $self = shift;
00091   $self->{parseerror} = "";
00092   $self->{posarray} = [];
00093   $self->{parseresult} = ['top', undef];
00094   my (@backtrace) = (\$self->{parseresult});
00095   my (@pushback) = ();
00096 
00097   my $currentref = \$self->{parseresult}->[1];
00098   my $curenttok;
00099 
00100   my $sstring = shift;
00101   $self->inittokenizer($sstring);
00102   $currenttok = $self->nexttoken;
00103   if (!$currenttok) {
00104     if ($self->{string} =~ m/\G$/g) {
00105       return $self->error("empty");
00106     } else {
00107       my($mark) = pop @{$self->{posarray}};
00108       my $position = 1+$mark->[0];
00109       return $self->error("Illegal character at position $position", $mark);
00110     }
00111   }
00112   # so I can assume we got a token
00113   local $_;
00114   while ($currenttok) {
00115     $_ = $currenttok->[0];
00116     /binop1/ && do {
00117       # check if we have a binary or unary operation here.
00118       if (defined(${$currentref})) {
00119         # binary - walk up the tree until we hit an open paren or the top
00120         while (${$currentref}->[0] !~ /^(openp|top)/) {
00121           $currentref = pop @backtrace;
00122         }
00123     my $index = ((${$currentref}->[0] eq 'top')?1:3);
00124         ${$currentref}->[$index] = ['binop1', $currenttok->[1],
00125                                     ${$currentref}->[$index], undef];
00126         push @backtrace, $currentref;
00127         push @backtrace, \${$currentref}->[$index];
00128         $currentref = \${$currentref}->[$index]->[3];
00129       } else {
00130         # unary
00131         ${$currentref} = ['unop1', $currenttok->[1], undef];
00132         push @backtrace, $currentref;
00133         $currentref = \${$currentref}->[2];
00134       }
00135     };
00136     /binop2/ && do {
00137       if (defined(${$currentref})) {
00138         # walk up the tree until an open paren, the top, binop1 or unop1
00139         # I decide arbitrarily that -3*4 should be parsed as -(3*4)
00140         # instead of as (-3)*4.  Not that it makes a difference.
00141 
00142         while (${$currentref}->[0] !~ /^(openp|top|binop1)/) {
00143           $currentref = pop @backtrace;
00144         }
00145         my $a = ${$currentref}->[0];
00146         my $index = (($a eq 'top')?1:3);
00147         ${$currentref}->[$index] = ['binop2', $currenttok->[1],
00148                                     ${$currentref}->[$index], undef];
00149         push @backtrace, $currentref;
00150         push @backtrace, \${$currentref}->[$index];
00151         $currentref = \${$currentref}->[$index]->[3];
00152       } else {
00153         # Error
00154         my($mark) = pop @{$self->{posarray}};
00155         my $position =1+$mark->[0];
00156         return $self->error("Didn't expect " . $currenttok->[1] .
00157                             " at position $position" , $mark);
00158       }
00159     };
00160     /binop3/ && do {
00161       if (defined(${$currentref})) {
00162         # walk up the tree until we need to stop
00163         # Note that the right-associated nature of ^ means we need to
00164         # stop walking backwards when we hit a ^ as well.
00165         while (${$currentref}->[0] !~ /^(openp|top|binop[123]|unop1)/) {
00166           $currentref = pop @backtrace;
00167         }
00168         my $a = ${$currentref}->[0];
00169         my $index = ($a eq 'top')?1:($a eq 'unop1')?2:3;
00170         ${$currentref}->[$index] = ['binop3', $currenttok->[1],
00171                                     ${$currentref}->[$index], undef];
00172         push @backtrace, $currentref;
00173         push @backtrace, \${$currentref}->[$index];
00174         $currentref = \${$currentref}->[$index]->[3];
00175       } else {
00176         # Error
00177         my($mark) = pop @{$self->{posarray}};
00178         my $position = 1+$mark->[0];
00179         return $self->error("Didn't expect " . $currenttok->[1] .
00180                             " at position $position", $mark);
00181       }
00182     };
00183     /openp/ && do {
00184       if (defined(${$currentref})) {
00185         # we weren't expecting this - must be implicit
00186         # multiplication.
00187         push @pushback, $currenttok;
00188         $currenttok = ['binop2', 'implicit'];
00189         next;
00190       } else {
00191         my($me) = pop @{$self->{posarray}};
00192         ${$currentref} = [$currenttok->[0], $currenttok->[1], $me, undef];
00193         push @backtrace, $currentref;
00194         $currentref = \${$currentref}->[3];
00195       }
00196     };
00197     /func1/ && do {
00198       if (defined(${$currentref})) {
00199         # we weren't expecting this - must be implicit
00200         # multiplication.
00201         push @pushback, $currenttok;
00202         $currenttok = ['binop2', 'implicit'];
00203         next;
00204       } else {
00205         # just like a unary operator
00206         ${$currentref} = [$currenttok->[0], $currenttok->[1], undef];
00207         push @backtrace, $currentref;
00208         $currentref = \${$currentref}->[2];
00209       }
00210     };
00211     /closep/ && do {
00212       if (defined(${$currentref})) {
00213         # walk up the tree until we need to stop
00214         while (${$currentref}->[0] !~ /^(openp|top)/) {
00215           $currentref = pop @backtrace;
00216         }
00217         my $a = ${$currentref}->[0];
00218         if ($a eq 'top') {
00219           my($mark) = pop @{$self->{posarray}};
00220           my $position = 1+$mark->[0];
00221           return $self->error("Unmatched close " . $currenttok->[1] .
00222                               " at position $position", $mark);
00223         } elsif ($close{${$currentref}->[1]} ne $currenttok->[1]) {
00224           my($mark) = pop @{$self->{posarray}};
00225           my $position = 1+$mark->[0];
00226           return $self->error("Mismatched parens at position $position"
00227                               , ${$currentref}->[2], $mark);
00228         } else {
00229           ${$currentref}->[0] = 'closep';
00230           ${$currentref}->[2] = pop @{${$currentref}};
00231         }
00232       } else {
00233         # Error - something like (3+4*)
00234         my($mark) = pop @{$self->{posarray}};
00235         my $position = 1+$mark->[0];
00236         return $self->error("Premature close " . $currenttok->[1] .
00237                             " at position $position", $mark);
00238       }
00239     };
00240     /special|varname|numberE?/ && do {
00241       if (defined(${$currentref})) {
00242         # we weren't expecting this - must be implicit
00243         # multiplication.
00244         push @pushback, $currenttok;
00245         $currenttok = ['binop2', 'implicit'];
00246         next;
00247       } else {
00248         ${$currentref} = [$currenttok->[0], $currenttok->[1]];
00249       }
00250     };
00251     if (@pushback) {
00252       $currenttok = pop @pushback;
00253     } else {
00254       $currenttok = $self->nexttoken;
00255     }
00256   }
00257   # ok, we stopped parsing.  Now we need to see why.
00258   if ($self->{parseresult}->[0] eq 'top') {
00259     $self->{parseresult} = $self->arraytoexpr($self->{parseresult}->[1]);
00260   } else {
00261     return $self->error("Internal consistency error; not at top when done");
00262   }
00263   if ($self->{string} =~ m/\G\s*$/g) {
00264     if (!defined(${$currentref})) {
00265       $self->{string} .= " ";
00266       return $self->error("I was expecting more at the end of the line",
00267                         [length($self->{string})-1, length($self->{string})]);
00268     } else {
00269       # check that all the parens were closed
00270       while (@backtrace) {
00271         $currentref = pop @backtrace;
00272         if (${$currentref}->[0] eq 'openp') {
00273           my($mark) = ${$currentref}->[2];
00274           my $position = 1+$mark->[0];
00275           return $self->error("Unclosed parentheses beginning at position $position"
00276                          , $mark);
00277         }
00278       }
00279       # Ok, we must really have parsed something
00280       return $self->{parseresult};
00281     }
00282   } else {
00283       my($mark) = pop @{$self->{posarray}};
00284       my $position = 1+$mark->[0];
00285       return $self->error("Illegal character at position $position",$mark);
00286   }
00287 }

00289 sub arraytoexpr {
00290   my ($self) = shift;
00291   return Expr->fromarray(@_);

00294 sub error {
00295   my($self, $errstr, @markers) = @_;
00296 #  print STDERR Data::Dumper->Dump([\@markers],
00297 #                                  ['$markers']);
00298   $self->{parseerror} = $errstr;
00299   my($htmledstring) = '<tt class="parseinput">';
00300   my($str) = $self->{string};
00301 #  print STDERR Data::Dumper->Dump([$str], ['$str']);
00302   my($lastpos) = 0;
00303   $str =~ s/ /\240/g;
00304   while(@markers) {
00305     my($ref) = shift @markers;
00306     my($pos1) = $ref->[0];
00307     my($pos2) = $ref->[1];
00308     if (!defined($pos2)) {$pos2 = $pos1+1;}
00309     $htmledstring .= encode_entities(substr($str,$lastpos,$pos1-$lastpos)) .
00310            '<b class="parsehilight">' .
00311            encode_entities(substr($str,$pos1,$pos2-$pos1)) .
00312            '</b>';
00313     $lastpos = $pos2;
00314   }
00315 #  print STDERR Data::Dumper->Dump([$str, $htmledstring, $lastpos],
00316 #                                  ['$str', '$htmledstring', '$lastpos']);
00317   $htmledstring .= encode_entities(substr($str,$lastpos));
00318   $htmledstring .= '</tt>';
00319 #  $self->{htmlerror} = '<p class="parseerr">' . "\n" .
00320 #                       '<span class="parsedesc">' .
00321 #                       encode_entities($errstr) . '</span><br>' . "\n" .
00322 #                       $htmledstring . "\n" . '</p>' . "\n";
00323   $self->{htmlerror} =  $htmledstring ;
00324   $self->{htmlerror} =  'empty' if $errstr eq 'empty';
00325   $self->{error_msg} = $errstr;
00326 
00327 #  warn $errstr . "\n";
00328   return undef;
00329 }

00347 sub exprtolatex {
00348   my($expr) = shift;
00349   my($exprobj);
00350   if ((ref $expr) eq 'ARRAY') {
00351     $exprobj = Expr->new(@$expr);
00352   } else {
00353     $exprobj = $expr;
00354   }
00355   return $exprobj->tolatex();
00356 }

00369 sub normalize {

00371   $self->{parseresult} = $self->{parseresult}->normalize($degree);

00374 sub normalize_expr {
00375   my($expr, $degree) = @_;
00376   my($exprobj);
00377   if ((ref $expr) eq 'ARRAY') {
00378     $exprobj = Expr->new(@$expr);
00379   } else {
00380     $exprobj = $expr;
00381   }
00382   return $exprobj->normalize($degree);

00397 sub new {

00410 sub normalize {
00411 #print STDERR "normalize\n";
00412 #print STDERR Data::Dumper->Dump([@_]);
00413 
00414   my($self, $degree) = @_;
00415   my($class) = ref $self;
00416   $degree = $degree || 0;
00417   my($type, @args) = @$self;
00418   local $_;
00419   $_ = $type;
00420   my ($ret) = [$type, @args];
00421 
00422 
00423   if(/closep/) {
00424     $ret = $args[1]->normalize($degree);
00425   } elsif (/unop1/) {
00426     $ret = $class->new($type, $args[0], $args[1]->normalize($degree));
00427   } elsif (/binop/) {
00428     $ret = $class->new($type, $args[0], $args[1]->normalize($degree),
00429                              $args[2]->normalize($degree));
00430   } elsif (/func1/) {
00431     $args[0] =~ s/^arc/a/;
00432     $ret = $class->new($type, $args[0], $args[1]->normalize($degree));
00433   }
00434 
00435 
00436   if ($degree < 0) {return $ret;}
00437 
00438 
00439   ($type, @args) = @$ret;
00440   $ret = $class->new($type, @args);
00441   $_ = $type;
00442   if (/binop1/ && ($args[2]->[0] =~ 'unop1')) {
00443     my($h1, $h2) = ($args[0], $args[2]->[1]);
00444     my($s1, $s2) = ($h1 eq '-', $h2 eq '-');
00445     my($eventual) = ($s1==$s2);
00446     if ($eventual) {
00447       $ret = $class->new('binop1', '+', $args[1], $args[2]->[2] );
00448     } else {
00449       $ret = $class->new('binop1', '-', $args[1], $args[2]->[2] );
00450     }
00451   } elsif (/binop2/ && ($args[1]->[0] =~ 'unop1')) {
00452     $ret = $class->new('unop1', '-',
00453                        $class->new($type, $args[0], $args[1]->[2],
00454                                    $args[2])->normalize($degree) );
00455   } elsif (/binop[12]/ && ($args[2]->[0] eq $type) &&
00456                           ($args[0] =~ /[+*]/)) {
00457 # Remove frivolous right-association
00458 # For example, fix 3+(4-5) or 3*(4x)
00459     $ret = $class->new($type, $args[2]->[1],
00460                        $class->new($type, $args[0], $args[1],
00461                                    $args[2]->[2])->normalize($degree),
00462                        $args[2]->[3]);
00463   } elsif (/unop1/ && ($args[0] eq '+')) {
00464     $ret = $args[1];
00465   } elsif (/unop1/ && ($args[1]->[0] =~ 'unop1')) {
00466     $ret = $args[1]->[2];
00467   }
00468   if ($degree > 0) {
00469   }
00470   return $ret;
00471 }
00472 
00473 sub tostring {
00474 # print STDERR "Expr::tostring\n";
00475 # print STDERR Data::Dumper->Dump([@_]);
00476   my($self) = shift;
00477   my($type, @args) = @$self;
00478   local $_;
00479   $_ = $type;
00480   /binop1/ && do {
00481     my ($p1, $p2) = ('','');
00482     if ($args[2]->[0] eq 'binop1') {($p1,$p2)=qw{ ( ) };}
00483     return ($args[1]->tostring() . $args[0] . $p1 .
00484             $args[2]->tostring() . $p2);
00485   };
00486   /unop1/ && do {
00487     my ($p1, $p2) = ('','');
00488     if ($args[1]->[0] =~ /binop1/) {($p1,$p2)=qw{ ( ) };}
00489     return ($args[0] . $p1 . $args[1]->tostring() . $p2);
00490   };
00491   /binop2/ && do {
00492     my ($p1, $p2, $p3, $p4)=('','','','');
00493     if ($args[0] =~ /implicit/) {$args[0] = ' ';}
00494     if ($args[1]->[0] =~ /binop1/) {($p1,$p2)=qw{ ( ) };}
00495 #    if ($args[2]->[0] =~ /binop[12]/) {($p3,$p4)=qw{ ( ) };}
00496     if ($args[2]->[0] =~ /binop[12]|unop1/) {($p3,$p4)=qw{ ( ) };}
00497     return ($p1 . $args[1]->tostring() . $p2 . $args[0] . $p3 .
00498             $args[2]->tostring() . $p4);
00499   };
00500   /binop3/ && do {
00501     my ($p1, $p2, $p3, $p4)=('','','','');
00502 #    if ($args[1]->[0] =~ /binop[123]|numberE/) {($p1,$p2)=qw{ ( ) };}
00503     if ($args[1]->[0] =~ /binop[123]|unop1|numberE/) {($p1,$p2)=qw{ ( ) };}
00504 #    if ($args[2]->[0] =~ /binop[12]|numberE/) {($p3,$p4)=qw{ ( ) };}
00505     if ($args[2]->[0] =~ /binop[12]|unop1|numberE/) {($p3,$p4)=qw{ ( ) };}
00506     return ($p1 . $args[1]->tostring() . $p2 . $args[0] . $p3 .
00507             $args[2]->tostring() . $p4);
00508   };
00509   /func1/ && do {
00510     return ($args[0] . '(' . $args[1]->tostring() . ')');
00511   };
00512   /special|varname|numberE?/ && return $args[0];
00513   /closep/ && do {
00514     my(%close) = %AlgParser::close;
00515 
00516 
00517 
00518     return ($args[0] . $args[1]->tostring() . $close{$args[0]});
00519   };
00520 }
00521 
00522 sub tolatex {
00523   my($self) = shift;
00524   my($type, @args) = @$self;
00525   local $_;
00526   $_ = $type;
00527   /binop1/ && do {
00528     my ($p1, $p2) = ('','');
00529     if ($args[2]->[0] eq 'binop1') {($p1,$p2)=qw{ \left( \right) };}
00530     return ($args[1]->tolatex() . $args[0] . $p1 .
00531             $args[2]->tolatex() . $p2);
00532   };
00533   /unop1/ && do {
00534     my ($p1, $p2) = ('','');
00535     if ($args[1]->[0] =~ /binop1/) {($p1,$p2)=qw{ \left( \right) };}
00536     return ($args[0] . $p1 . $args[1]->tolatex() . $p2);
00537   };
00538   /binop2/ && do {
00539     my ($p1, $p2, $p3, $p4)=('','','','');
00540     my ($lop,$rop) = ($args[1]->tolatex,$args[2]->tolatex);
00541     if ($args[0] eq '/'){
00542       return('\frac{'.$lop.'}{'.$rop.'}');
00543     } else {
00544       $lop = '\left('.$lop.'\right)' if ($args[1]->[0] =~ /binop1|numberE/);
00545       $rop = '\left('.$rop.'\right)' if ($args[2]->[0] =~ /binop[12]|numberE|unop1/);
00546       if ($args[0] =~ /implicit/) {
00547     $args[0] = ($lop =~ m/[.0-9]$/ && $rop =~ m/^[-+.0-9]/) ? '\cdot ' : ' ';
00548       }
00549       return ($p1.$lop.$p2. $args[0] .$p3.$rop.$p4);
00550     }
00551   };
00552   /binop3/ && do {
00553     my ($p1, $p2, $p3, $p4)=('','','','');
00554 #    if ($args[1]->[0] =~ /binop[123]|numberE/) {($p1,$p2)=qw{ \left( \right) };}
00555   if ($args[1]->[0] =~ /binop[123]|unop1|numberE/) {($p1,$p2)=qw{ \left( \right) };}
00556 # Not necessary in latex
00557 #   if ($args[2]->[0] =~ /binop[12]/) {($p3,$p4)=qw{ \left( \right) };}
00558     return ($p1 . $args[1]->tolatex() . $p2 . "^{" . $p3 .
00559             $args[2]->tolatex() . $p4 . "}");
00560   };
00561   /func1/ && do {
00562       my($p1,$p2);
00563       if($args[0] eq "sqrt"){($p1,$p2)=('{','}');}
00564       else {($p1,$p2)=qw{ \left( \right) };}
00565 
00566       #
00567       #  DPVC -- 2003/03/31
00568       #       added missing trig functions
00569       #
00570       #$specialfunc = '(?:abs|logten|asin|acos|atan|sech|sgn|step|fact)';
00571       $specialfunc = '(?:abs|logten|a(?:sin|cos|tan|sec|csc|cot)h?|sech|csch|sgn|step|fact)';
00572       #
00573       #  End DPVC
00574       #
00575 
00576       if ($args[0] =~ /$specialfunc/) {
00577          return ('\mbox{' . $args[0] .'}'. $p1 . $args[1]->tolatex() . $p2);
00578       }
00579       else {
00580         return ('\\' . $args[0] . $p1 . $args[1]->tolatex() . $p2);
00581       }
00582   };
00583   /special/ && do {
00584     if ($args[0] eq 'pi') {return '\pi';} else {return $args[0];}
00585   };
00586   /varname|(:?number$)/ && return $args[0];
00587   /numberE/ && do {
00588     $args[0] =~ m/($AlgParser::numberplain)E([-+]?\d+)/;
00589     return ($1 . '\times 10^{' . $2 . '}');
00590   };
00591   /closep/ && do {
00592     my($backslash) = '';
00593     my(%close) = %AlgParser::close;
00594     if ($args[0] eq '{') {$backslash = '\\';}
00595 #This is for editors to match: }
00596     return ('\left' . $backslash . $args[0] . $args[1]->tolatex() .
00597             '\right' . $backslash . $close{$args[0]});
00598   };
00599 }
00600 
00601 sub fromarray {
00602   my($class) = shift;
00603   my($expr) = shift;
00604   if ((ref $expr) ne qq{ARRAY}) {
00605     die "Program error; fromarray not passed an array ref.";
00606   }
00607   my($type, @args) = @$expr;
00608   foreach my $i (@args) {
00609     if (ref $i) {
00610       $i = $class->fromarray($i);
00611     }
00612   }
00613   return $class->new($type, @args);
00614 }
00615 
00616 package ExprWithImplicitExpand;
00617 @ISA=qw(Expr);
00618 
00619 
00620 sub tostring {
00621 # print STDERR "ExprWIE::tostring\n";
00622 # print STDERR Data::Dumper->Dump([@_]);
00623   my ($self) = shift;
00624 
00625   my($type, @args) = @$self;
00626 
00627   if (($type eq qq(binop2)) && ($args[0] eq qq(implicit))) {
00628     my ($p1, $p2, $p3, $p4)=('','','','');
00629     if ($args[1]->head =~ /binop1/) {($p1,$p2)=qw{ ( ) };}
00630 #    if ($args[2]->head =~ /binop[12]/) {($p3,$p4)=qw{ ( ) };}
00631     if ($args[2]->head =~ /binop[12]|unop1/) {($p3,$p4)=qw{ ( ) };}
00632     return ($p1 . $args[1]->tostring() . $p2 . '*' . $p3 .
00633             $args[2]->tostring() . $p4);
00634   } else {
00635     return $self->SUPER::tostring(@_);
00636   }
00637 }
